demiCleGanse.name: Slip Hitch
demiCleGanse.description: Essential knot for securing lines temporarily to posts and rails.

chaise.name: Bowline
chaise.description: Creates a secure loop that won't slip under load.

zeppelin.name: Zeppelin Bend
zeppelin.description: Strong and reliable bend for joining two ropes.

papillonBoucle.name: Butterfly Loop
papillonBoucle.description: Creates a secure loop in the middle of a rope.

tmdc.name: Round Turn Two Half Hitches
tmdc.description: Simple knot for mooring and strong tension applications.

taquet.name: Cleat Hitch
taquet.description: Specialized knot for securing lines to boat cleats.

huit.name: Figure Eight
huit.description: Stopper knot that prevents rope from running through blocks.
